pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull of Australia | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke yesterday with Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull of Australia. 

Prime Minister Turnbull offered condolences for the lives lost and people injured in the attack at the mosque in Quebec City on January 29, 2017. The two leaders reiterated the importance of fostering diverse and multicultural societies.

The two Prime Ministers agreed to promote an open and progressive international trade agenda and committed to work to strengthen bilateral cooperation. To that end, they spoke of the importance that initiatives such as the Australia Canada Economic Leadership Forum have â€Žin advancing the relationship.
